message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $115. I believe it will be highly valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $112.50?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you at $112. I think that's as low as I can go. Can you meet me there?
